item.title: 火鸡成本降低，今年美国感恩节大餐将更便宜
item.description: 通胀疲软的消费者今年应该会发现，经典感恩节大餐的费用会从他们的薪水中减少，这主要是因为美国人减少了购买感恩节大餐的主菜--火鸡。【原文：Inflation-weary consumers should see the cost of their classic Thanksgiving dinner gobble less of their paychecks this year, largely because Americans are buying less of the meal's centerpiece dish, turkey.】

item.title: 韩国锌业收购战考验首尔应对 "韩国折扣 "的决心
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc）的收购战给首尔增添了压力，迫使其通过立法改革，以确保在一个股票市场由家族企业主导的国家，为所有投资者提供更好的保护。【原文：A takeover battle over Korea Zinc is adding pressure on Seoul to pass legislative reforms to ensure better protections for all investors in a country with a stock market dominated by family-run conglomerates.】

item.title: 波音公司向密苏里州近 700 名员工发出裁员通知
item.description: 根据周三公布的一份联邦政府要求的文件，波音公司向密苏里州的 692 名工人发出了裁员通知，这是这家负债累累的美国飞机制造商计划裁员 1.7 万人（占其全球员工总数的 10%）的一部分。【原文：Boeing issued lay off notices to 692 workers in Missouri, home to the company's Defense, Space & Security division, according to a federally-required filing posted on Wednesday, as part of the debt-heavy U.S. planemaker's plan to cut 17,000 jobs, or 10% of its global workforce.】

item.title: Reddit 对影响美国数千人的网络中断进行修复
item.description: Reddit 周三表示，它已经推出了一个软件漏洞的修复程序，该软件漏洞导致美国数万人无法访问该社交媒体平台。【原文：Reddit said on Wednesday it has rolled out a fix for a software bug that prevented tens of thousands of people from accessing the social media platform in the U.S.】

item.title: 早间竞价英伟达业绩超预期，但未能带来火花
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片领军企业英伟达预测第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 本周三，英伟达（Nvidia）预测第四季度营收略高于预期，押注于其梦寐以求的人工智能芯片的强劲销售，但仍未能达到投资者的高预期，而投资者已将英伟达打造成全球最有价值的公司。【原文：Nvidia forecast fourth-quarter revenue slightly above estimates on Wednesday, betting on robust sales of its coveted AI chips, but still failed to meet lofty expectations of investors who have made it the world's most valuable firm.】

item.title: 雪花公司上调年度产品收入预期，宣布与 Anthropic 达成人工智能协议
item.description: 雪花公司（Snowflake）周三上调了年度产品收入预期，押注于数据云和分析平台的强劲需求，并宣布与人工智能公司 Anthropic 建立合作伙伴关系。【原文：Snowflake on Wednesday raised its annual product revenue forecast, betting on robust demand for its data cloud and analytics platform, and announced a partnership with artificial intelligence firm Anthropic.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯认为美国央行未来将有更多降息举措
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周三重申，她认为美国央行未来还会有更多的降息举措，因为美国央行正努力使货币政策正常化，同时缓解通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins reiterated on Wednesday she believes the U.S. central bank has more interest rate cuts ahead as it seeks to normalize monetary policy while inflation pressures ease.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼集团主席在美国被起诉
item.description: 美国检察官周三表示，印度企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）主席高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）因涉嫌行贿数亿美元并向美国投资者隐瞒这一计划而在美国被起诉。【原文：The chair of Indian conglomerate Adani Group, Gautam Adani, has been indicted in the U.S. over an alleged scheme to pay hundreds of millions of dollars in bribes and conceal the scheme from American investors, prosecutors said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国指控五人参与 "分散蜘蛛 "黑客计划
item.description: 美国检察官周三公布了对 Scattered Spider 五名涉嫌成员的刑事指控，该网络犯罪团伙涉嫌入侵数十家美国公司，窃取机密信息和加密货币。【原文：U.S. prosecutors unveiled criminal charges on Wednesday against five alleged members of Scattered Spider, a cybercrime group suspected of hacking into dozens of U.S. companies to steal confidential information and cryptocurrency.】

item.title: Pinebridge 称，非衰退性降息周期应支持信贷业务
item.description: 资产管理公司 PineBridge Investments 在一份报告中称，它看到了一个罕见的非衰退性降息周期的开始，这将支持杠杆融资等固定收益资产的表现。【原文：Asset manager PineBridge Investments said in a report that it is seeing the start of a rare non-recessionary interest rate-cutting cycle that should support performance of fixed income assets like leveraged finance.】

item.title: 浑水公司称做空 Elf Beauty 股票后股价下滑
item.description: 对冲基金首席执行官卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）周三在伦敦举行的 Sohn 会议上表示，浑水公司（Muddy Waters）持有化妆品公司精灵美妆（Elf Beauty）的空头头寸。【原文：Muddy Waters has taken a short position in cosmetics company Elf Beauty , the hedge fund's chief executive Carson Block said at the Sohn conference in London on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼表示降息令人担忧
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周三对美国央行在通胀率持续高于美联储2%的目标时降息表示不满，这为她呼吁对进一步降息采取谨慎态度增添了几分色彩。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Wednesday expressed discomfort with the U.S. central bank cutting interest rates while inflation continues to run above the Fed's 2% goal, adding a bit more color to her call for a cautious approach to further rate reductions.】

item.title: 阿根廷 YPF 公司将于 2025 年第二季度为石油管道寻求 20 亿美元融资
item.description: 阿根廷国营石油公司 YPF 的一位消息人士周三称，该公司将在 2025 年第二季度寻求 20 亿美元的融资，以完成其 Vaca Muerta Sur 项目。【原文：Argentina's state-run oil company YPF will seek $2 billion in financing in the second quarter of 2025 to complete its Vaca Muerta Sur project, a company source said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新闻集团称投资者拒绝终止双重类别投票结构的提议
item.description: 新闻集团（News Corp）周三表示，投资者拒绝了激进投资者 Starboard Value 提出的终止双重类别投票结构、打破默多克家族对出版商控制的建议。【原文：News Corp said on Wednesday that investors rejected a proposal by activist investor Starboard Value to break the Murdoch family's grip on the publisher by ending a dual class voting structure.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，高盛首席执行官所罗门认为明年资本市场将保持强劲势头
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，预计 2025 年资本市场将更加稳健，随着通胀缓解和新政府准备上台，他也加入了一波积极预测的行列。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon expects capital markets to be more robust in 2025, he said in an interview with CNBC on Wednesday, joining a wave of positive forecasts as inflation eases and a new administration prepares to take office.】

item.title: 美国高管权衡特朗普关税提案带来的风险
item.description: 许多美国公司的高管们正在为当选总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现其提高关税的竞选承诺所带来的影响做准备，此举可能会扰乱供应链并加剧通胀压力。【原文：Top executives at many U.S. companies are preparing for the impact from President-elect Donald Trump fulfilling his campaign promise of raising tariffs, a move that could disrupt supply chains and worsen inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼呼吁谨慎对待利率问题
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）是美国央行最鹰派的决策者之一，她周三呼吁对任何进一步降息采取谨慎态度，并指出通胀仍然令人担忧，劳动力市场强劲。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman, among the U.S. central bank's most hawkish policymakers, on Wednesday called for a cautious approach to any further interest rate cuts, noting that inflation remains a concern and the labor market is strong.】

item.title: PIMCO 看好股市，寄希望于美国经济软着陆，对通胀持谨慎态度
item.description: 对美国经济的乐观展望促使美国债券巨头 PIMCO 转而青睐股票和其他一些风险资产，同时寻求防范通胀，因为新一届美国政府可能会实施一些对物价造成上涨压力的政策。【原文：An optimistic outlook on the U.S. economy is prompting U.S. bond giant PIMCO to favor stocks and some other risk assets, while seeking protection against inflation as the new U.S. government could implement policies that put upward pressure on prices.】

item.title: 意法半导体首席执行官表示，芯片制造商需要中国，因此意法半导体与华虹合作
item.description: 欧洲电脑芯片制造商意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）首席执行官周三宣布了与中国代工企业华虹合作的新计划，认为在中国本地生产对其竞争地位至关重要。【原文：The chief executive of European computer chipmaker STMicroelectronics on Wednesday announced new plans to partner with Chinese foundry Hua Hong , arguing that having local manufacturing in China is vital to its competitive position.】

item.title: 阿诺特家族表示，LVMH 品牌可以选择是否与巴黎足球俱乐部（Paris FC）建立合作关系
item.description: 亿万富翁伯纳德-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）之子安托万-阿尔诺（Antoine Arnault）周三表示，一旦 LVMH 集团获得法国巴黎足球俱乐部的控股权，阿尔诺家族控股公司将不会向 LVMH 品牌施压，迫使其与巴黎足球俱乐部建立合作关系。【原文：The Arnault family holding will not pressure LVMH brands into forging partnerships with Paris FC once it acquires a controlling stake in the French capital's soccer club, Antoine Arnault, son of billionaire Bernard Arnault, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: UAW 称福特肯塔基电池厂大部分工人签署了工会卡
item.description: 美国肯塔基州福特汽车电池厂工会周三表示，该厂大多数工人已签署了支持美国汽车工人联合会的卡片。【原文：A majority of workers at a Ford Motor battery plant in Kentucky have signed cards indicating their support for the United Auto Workers, the union said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储库克预计通货紧缩将持续，更多削减可能是适当的
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周三表示，美国通胀继续缓解，工资和就业市场降温，价格过度上涨主要限于住房，在这种情况下，继续降息可能仍然是合适的。【原文：U.S. inflation continues to ease, with wages and the job market cooling and excess price increases largely confined to housing, a situation in which it will likely remain appropriate to continue cutting interest rates, Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，欧佩克+可能会在更长时间内坚持大幅减产石油
item.description: 消息人士和分析师说，欧佩克+将在 12 月举行会议，届时在石油政策方面几乎没有回旋余地：由于需求疲软，增加产量将是冒险之举，而由于一些成员国希望增加抽油量，因此很难深化供应削减。【原文：OPEC+ will have little room to manoeuvre on oil policy when it meets in December: it would be risky to increase output because of weak demand, and difficult to deepen supply cuts because some members want to pump more, sources and analysts said.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的前副手王避免因加密货币欺诈入狱
item.description: 前加密货币高管加里-王（Gary Wang）编写了计算机代码，帮助 FTX 创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）从现已破产的交易所客户那里窃取了约 80 亿美元。【原文：Former cryptocurrency executive Gary Wang, who wrote the computer code that helped FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried steal about $8 billion from customers of the now-bankrupt exchange, was spared prison time by a judge on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国生物技术公司莱克纳与礼来合作开发保护肌肉的肥胖症药物
item.description: 礼来公司和在香港上市的莱克纳公司周三表示，双方将合作开发一种实验性肥胖症药物，旨在帮助患者减肥的同时保留肌肉。【原文：Eli Lilly and Hong Kong-listed Laekna will collaborate to develop an experimental obesity drug that aims to help patients lose weight while preserving muscle, the biotech said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 暂停意大利南部工厂的生产
item.description: 由于产品需求持续疲软，Stellantis 周三宣布其位于意大利南部的两家工厂暂时停工。【原文：Stellantis on Wednesday announced new temporary stoppages for two of its plants in southern Italy as the automaker continues to suffer from weak demand for its products.】

item.title: Firstrade 将提供隔夜交易服务，加入越来越多的美国经纪商行列
item.description: 在线经纪商 Firstrade 计划于 2025 年初推出隔夜交易，这是最近一家希望为零售客户提供在正常营业时间以外交易美国股票和交易所交易基金机会的公司。【原文：Online brokerage Firstrade plans to launch overnight trading in early 2025, the latest firm looking to offer retail clients the chance to trade US stocks and exchange-traded funds outside of regular hours.】

item.title: 美国为 GlobalFoundries 扩大生产敲定 15 亿美元芯片奖
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，已敲定向 GlobalFoundries 提供 15 亿美元的政府补贴，以扩大其在马耳他、纽约和佛蒙特州的半导体生产。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Wednesday it has finalized a $1.5 billion government subsidy for GlobalFoundries to expand semiconductor production in Malta, New York and Vermont.】

item.title: 毕马威将斥资 1 亿美元与谷歌云建立人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: 毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）周三表示，将在未来四年斥资1亿美元，通过与Alphabet的谷歌云（Google Cloud）合作，加强其企业人工智能服务。【原文：KPMG said on Wednesday it would spend $100 million over the next four years to bolster its enterprise artificial intelligence services through a partnership with Alphabet's Google Cloud.】
